title: The Hebrew at MyFonts
content:
Now -- all the Hebrew fonts at MyFonts.com (and Veer of course):

[The Hebrew Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193508/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=david+hamuel)
author: david h

comments.content:
Nice work David.  
I especially like Ayasha (although I know absolutely nothing about the Hebrew alphabet!)

Why only single weights?  
Shirah Joie would be good in a Thin, and Poster 1492 in an Extra Bold.

Thank you Nick.

\> although I know absolutely nothing about the Hebrew alphabet!

No problem. I can teach you the basic :)

\> Why only single weights?

I'm about to add more, working on that.
